4. Metadata, are you collecting metadata with your measurements, OME for example is often used for microscopy (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2) 
7. KU leuven now also has a data repository (RDR) that you can use for data preservation and sharing: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr. For microscopy have a look if IDR or a similar repository could be suitable (https://idr.openmicroscopy.org/)
